title: Need 29 rp
body: Hey Riot, I know you aren't listening but im 29 rp off project vayne. I put 10 dollars of rp in today thinking I would get 1100 rp as I thought that was how much you got. idk what you can do but could I pls have 29 rp

replies.body: Make art (shitty or decent) and send it via support ticket specifying how much RP you need (usually maxing out at 50RP)

> [{quoted}](name=DarkShade918,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8gkqEwNY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-03-13T08:24:04.841+0000)
>
> Make art (shitty or decent) and send it via support ticket specifying how much RP you need (usually maxing out at 50RP)

It has to be related to the thing you want, by the way.
